original_text: Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons. They are always cruel and they are never kind. They ride into the battle on their horses, and it sounds like the noise of the sea. They are ready to attack you, people of Babylon! Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons. They are always cruel and they are never kind. They ride into the battle on their horses, and it sounds like the noise of the sea. They are ready to attack you, people of Babylon! Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons. Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons.
korean_text: 그들은 활과 투창을 가진 자라 잔인하여 불쌍히 여기지 아니하며 그들의 목소리는 바다가 설레임 같도다 딸 바벨론아 그들이 말을 타고 무사 같이 각기 네 앞에서 대열을 갖추었도다

sentences.original_text: Its soldiers carry bows and spears
They ride into the battle on their horses
and it sounds like the noise of the sea
They are ready to attack you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너를 공격할 준비가 되어 있다
